title: Speaking to students
content: Jason Allen, an Ottawa Rutland School alumnus spoke to Rutland students Sept. 11 about the importance of education and learning to get along with others. Shown with Allen in the bottom row is Jakobi Reed. Additional students are (middle row from left) Logan Middleton, Libby Kovash, Emily Green, and Lina Martinezc, and (back row from left) Jackson Damron, Ethan Rugher, Cayden Reynolds, Brooke Kozlowski, Camryn Beals.
